title: Hyundai sales dip 10% in Sept with 64,201 units sold
description: Hyundai Motor India reported a 10% year-on-year drop in total sales for September, with domestic sales down 6% to 51,101 units and exports falling 25% to 13,100 units. COO Tarun Garg highlighted that SUVs now represent 70% of sales. The company anticipates a boost from new models during the festive season.
